mapper.select: select my.user_id, my.user_nm, my.email, my.brth_dt, BIRTH_YEAR, (YEAR(SYSDATE())-BIRTH_YEAR) as AGE, my.mobile, alrm.BNF_EVT_YN as MK_USE_YN, my.SX, my.GUNHYUP_YN, my.ADMIN_YN, my.CHECKUP_KEY, my.THEME from T_WLK_MY my inner join T_WLK_cmm_alrm_stt alrm on alrm.USER_ID = my.USER_ID where my.user_id = #{userId}

WITH RECURSIVE date_range AS ( SELECT #{startDt} AS dt UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(dt, INTERVAL 1 DAY) FROM date_range WHERE dt < #{endDt} ) SELECT d.dt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_wlk_my u WHERE u.regist_dt <= d.dt) AS user_cnt FROM date_range d
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN wd_yn = 'y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS y_count, SUM(CASE WHEN wd_yn = 'n' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS n_count FROM t_wlk_my
